EmailTemplate.name: STANLIB LISP Prospect Acknowledgement
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for contacting us: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Client,
We have received your email and will be in contact shortly. If you require immediate assistance, please call us on 011 448 5206 / 6106 with your reference number {!Case.CaseNumber}.
As a reminder our operating hours are Monday to Friday from 8h00 to 17h00.
Regards, STANLIB Client Experience: LISP
{!Case.Email_Thread}
